title: Primary School Philosophy
itunes:subtitle: Philosophy Now Radio Show #13
itunes:author: Philosophy Now
description: Grant Bartley from Philosophy Now introduces Peter Worley from The Philosophy Foundation who conducts a live philosophy lesson with a group of 8-to-10 year olds from All Saints Primary School in Blackheath.  First broadcast on 26 October 2011 on Resonance FM.
itunes:summary: Grant Bartley from Philosophy Now introduces Peter Worley from The Philosophy Foundation who conducts a live philosophy lesson with a group of 8-to-10 year olds from All Saints Primary School in Blackheath.  First broadcast on 26 October 2011 on Resonance FM.
